${ModID}:AstralFracture.NAME: Astral Fracture
${ModID}:AstralFracture.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Exhaust a card.

${ModID}:Cognition.NAME: Cognition
${ModID}:Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Scry !M! before drawing.

${ModID}:EternalStrike.NAME: Eternal Strike
${ModID}:EternalStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this card is Exhausted, add a copy of it to your hand with !M! more damage.

${ModID}:FalseGrit.NAME: False Grit
${ModID}:FalseGrit.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Exhaust !M! more cards.

${ModID}:HeatEngine.NAME: Heat Engine
${ModID}:HeatEngine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card with a cost of 2 or greater, including ${ModID}:Amplify, is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Recall.NAME: Recall
${ModID}:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is ${ModID}:Amplified, put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

${ModID}:RefractEnergy.NAME: Refract Energy
${ModID}:RefractEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Reduce this card's cost by 1 本场战斗.

${ModID}:RopeTrick.NAME: Rope Trick
${ModID}:RopeTrick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:Subspace.NAME: Subspace
${ModID}:Subspace.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Subspace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to !M! times their ${ModID}:Distortion. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:SubtleKnife.NAME: Subtle Knife
${ModID}:SubtleKnife.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : Exhaust, then add a copy of this to your 弃牌堆.
